title: WC License Plates
excerpt: [digg=http://digg.com/offbeat_news/WC_License_Plates]I’m going to first start off by saying that I have absolutely nothing against the Chinese. The second thing I’m going to say is that they have some extremely odd peculiarities. The latest oddity appearing here in the news is over the initials “WC” being placed on license plates.
